channel.title: Meta on NoSlackDev
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on NoSlackDev

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello Hello, I’m Stephen. Welcome to NoSlackDev. This first post is also represented in the About section. The idea behind this blog is still forming, but instead of trying to have a fully fleshed out idea before starting it, I thought it wise to just start… and see where it goes. This is a blog about learning and improving in general, with a particular focus around software development. I seek to guide myself through a growing curriculum of classes, books, projects, and other activities to improve myself in many ways: as a technologist, a developer, a problem solver, a thinker, a builder, a consultant, and in a variety of other skills and interests that I may write about here.
